item.title: Jekyll HPSTR-Theme Blog Index Demo
item.description: Since I changed the theme too quickly for anyone to really see what it looked like, I’ve been saving images of how it used to look. The whole point was not to just have the same theme, but to be able to try out many Hugo themes… Though I really did like the HPSTR theme, I might switch back to the jekyll version even :) Webwork.tools Jekyll HPSTR Index-Full
